The stand should be one of the wooden display stands already present in the exhibition area. The brass artifact should be approximately 1.5 feet in diameter and 1 foot tall, with intricate designs and a shiny surface that reflects light. The artifact should be positioned so that it appears to be teetering, with one edge of its base barely on the stand.
